title: Byte Latent Transformer: Patches Scale Better Than Tokens
author: zxexz
aiHeadline: Breakthrough Alert: Byte Latent Transformer Proves Patches Are the New Tokens, Because Who Needs Tokens Anyway, Right? It's Time to Rethink Everything We Thought We Knew About AI and Start Patching Our Way to Success, or at Least That's What the Researchers at Meta Are Claiming

title: What Is Entropy? A Measure of Just How Little We Know
author: nsoonhui
aiHeadline: Entropy: The Ultimate Measure of Our Collective Ignorance, or How Little We Actually Know About the World, and Isn't It Refreshing to Admit That We're All Just Making It Up as We Go Along, Thanks to This Enlightening Article from Quantamagazine That's Left Us All Feeling Enlightened and Confused at the Same Time

title: I made a free Figma library packed with components for fast prototyping
author: kojiwakayama
aiHeadline: Free Figma Library Alert: Because Who Doesn't Love Free Stuff, Especially When It Comes to Prototyping, and This Generous Developer Has Given Us All a Gift, a Shiny New Figma Kit Packed with Components to Make Our Lives Easier, or at Least Our Prototyping Lives, Thanks to the Kindness of Strangers and the Magic of Open-Source

title: Humans are unreliable models of mouse disease
author: XzetaU8
aiHeadline: Science News: Humans Are Officially Terrible at Modeling Mouse Diseases, Who Knew, and It Turns Out We're Not as Good at This Whole 'Science' Thing as We Thought, ButHey, at Least We're Good at Making Fun of Ourselves and Our Lack of Understanding, Thanks to This Groundbreaking Study That's Left Us All Laughing and Cryingsimultaneously

title: They See Your Photos
author: vladyslavfox
aiHeadline: They See Your Photos, and Honestly, It's a Little Creepy, But Also Kind of Fascinating in a Voyeuristic Sort of Way, Like Watching a Train Wreck That You Can't Look Away from, and This Website Is Exposing the Harsh Reality of Photo Privacy, or Lack Thereof, and We're All Just Along for the Ride, Whether We Like It or Not
